Windlord::

Windlord  saw a Alliance member attaking at Teltoli and thought that 
it was time to join the battle. He aimed his metaligs-feathers (That 
were sharped knifes and missiles at time)  to the bot and shot them


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, steph_teltoli@m... wrote:
> Teltoli noted with a shock that a bot standing to the one she was 
> attacking suddenly vanished, after looking evilly at her. 'Oh 
great.. 
> what else could happen?' She thought to herself, and got ready to 
> jump when the bot fired at her.
> 
> Suddenly she felt a shadow loom over her, and a voice that said 
> "Please don't hurt me for this" before she felt lips on her own. 
Her 
> eyes widened with shock, and she tensed, trying to pull away, but 
she 
> felt her wounds being healed and she grinned, thankful.
> 
> Her artificial muscles knitted back together as the blood replaced 
> itself, and her body was as good as new. She put a hand on her arm, 
> the bullet wounds gone.
> 
> "Thank you, I'll have to pay you back sometime" Teltoli smiled at 
> Angel Prime.
